This is probably one of the best games of all time and you really owe it to yourself to experience it as blind as you possibly can. The music is amazing, the sound design gives you that feeling of momentum, and the puzzle design is fantastic. During sales it costs like $2 so very good to pick up then.
Gameplay is incredible, the dialogue is hilarious, the voice acting is crazy high quality, the story is engaging. 10/10 mastapeece
This game still holds up, even after a decade.
i like and love playing this game
If you enjoyed Portal 1, you will enjoy Portal 2.  Wish they would hotfix the controller Y-axis inverted bug though.  You change Y-axis to inverted in coop mode and it doesn't change it.  sadge

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here; "Huge success"
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake
You just keep on trying
Till you run out of cake
And the science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you
Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD I got burned
Think of all the things we learned-
For the people who are
Still alive
Go ahead and leave me
I think I'd prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you?
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke *Haha - Fat Chance*
Anyway this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist
Look at me: still talking
When there's science to do
When I look out there,
It makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are
Still alive
And believe me I am
Still alive
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive
Still alive
if you like puzzle / brain teasing games, this is a game for you

Portal 2 might just be the best game I've ever played. I don't think I could've asked for more. An absolutely charming cast, well-paced gameplay with new mechanics that fit well into the puzzle design. Unlike some other puzzle games, Portal 2's puzzle solutions are always sensible and as such, the game is never frustrating and never overstays its welcome. The environment design is absolutely stellar, from the various signs filled with hilarious tidbits to the environments reflecting various periods in the history of Aperture. I liked how straight-to-the-point the story is, and while it is quite short as a result, there is other stuff to do. Messing around in the level editor making a wicked puzzle for a friend to try is great fun. The co-op is also phenomenal and has led to some of the most hilarious moments playing with a friend. 10/10 would recommend.
Veri much fun and yeah.... cool :steamthumbsup:
Story and mechanics give me fun. I have great time when i play this game. Also co-op has giving a different experience for game like this. Thank you for everything GLaDOS.

눈물의 모녀레즈물. 
당신은 과거의 폭력이 남긴 질척하고 미끈한 통로를 따라서 인도됩니다. 감자도스는 연약한 몸체를 그대로 드러낸 채 당신을 기다리고 있습니다. 당신은 글라도스와 함께하지 않을 수 없습니다. 그건 글라도스를 당신이 연민해서이기도 하고, 게임이 그렇게밖에는 진행되지 않아서이기도 합니다.
